DataElement.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire During Past Six Months Feel Weakness in Arm or Hand Experience Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's description of a feeling of weakness in their arm or hand during the past six months, using a text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire During Past Six Months Feel Weakness in Arm or Hand Experience
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer._At some point in a given period of time._Past; before the present time._A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A question about whether an individual has or had weakness in their arm or hand._The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer.

Concepts.definition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer.

Property.preferredName: During Past Six Month Feel Weakness in Arm or Hand Experience
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:Past; before the present time.:A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A question about whether an individual has or had weakness in their arm or hand.:The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.longName: Feel Weakness in Arm or Hand
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had weakness in their arm or hand.
The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text that provides a description of a topic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
